Articles.Content:
For my a level I.t coursework i am going to be making a small game in Unity 3D much like Kerbal space program. however in my game i plan to have thw rockets as pre buit and with maybe some small editing of the rockets allowed and i was wondering if anyone could either help me learn how to do this or point me in the direction of something that means i could use as a tutorial.

thanks
Moderator Comment: This would be better suited in the 'Off Topic' section of the forums.

So basicaly you want to find information on the internet. Hm, doesn't sound too hard.

http://bit.ly/Ph2FRk

jfx, not useful or helpful, and kind of insulting, you should have just ignored this thread rather than answered.

pleisdeath, a good place to start is here.
Ok thanks for that i will check that out and see if it can help thanks for the useful reply
